entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 21 & 22
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 21 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
aggregate/ˈæɡrɪɡət/n./v.总数/聚集aggregate demand/investment/turnover (总需求/投资/成交量)
alternative/ɔːlˈtɜːrnətɪv/n./adj.替代的/选择New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers (治疗关节炎的新方法可能会提供一种止痛药的替代品)
ambience/ˈæmbiəns/n.气氛/环境the relaxed ambience of the city (这座城市轻松的氛围)
anecdotal/ˌænɪkˈdoʊtl/adj.轶事的Anecdotal evidence is based on individual accounts, rather than on reliable research or statistics, and so may not be valid
apartment/əˈpɑːrtmənt/n.公寓a two-bedroom apartment (两室一厅的公寓)
arthritis/ɑːrˈθraɪtɪs/n.关节炎arthritis treatment (关节炎治疗)
authentic/ɔːˈθɛntɪk/adj.真实的/真正的authentic cuisine (地道的美食)
banner/ˈbænər/n.横幅a banner ad (横幅广告)
botany/ˈboʊtni/n.植物学a botany professor (植物学教授)
calcium/ˈkælsiəm/n.钙calcium supplement (钙补充剂)
chaste/tʃeɪst/adj.贞洁的lead a chaste life (过着贞洁的生活)
closet/ˈklɑːzɪt/n.衣柜walk-in closet (步入式衣柜)
concise/kənˈsaɪs/adj.简洁的Sam’s text is concise and informative (文字简洁、内容丰富)
confederacy/kənˈfɛdərəsi/n.联盟A confederacy is a union of states or people who are trying to achieve the same thing (同盟/联盟)
contagious/kənˈteɪdʒəs/adj.有传染性的contagious disease (传染病)
convention/kənˈvɛnʃən/n.会议/公约Geneva Convention (日内瓦公约)
deplete/dɪˈpliːt/v.耗尽deplete natural resources (耗尽自然资源)
emblem/ˈɛmbləm/n.徽章/象征national emblem (国徽) / The eagle was an emblem of strength and courage (鹰是力量和勇气的象征)
funding/ˈfʌndɪŋ/n.资金funding for research (研究资金)
garb/ɡɑːrb/n.服装prison garb 囚服
halt/hɔːlt/v./n.停止come to a halt (停下来)
incursion/ɪnˈkɜːrʒən/n.入侵resist the incursion (抵抗入侵)
inn/ɪn/n.小旅馆stay at an inn (在客栈住宿)
internship/ˈɪntɚˌʃɪp/n.实习take up an internship (开始实习)
journalism/ˈdʒɝːnəˌlɪzəm/n.新闻业I’ve made some useful contacts in journalism (我在新闻界结交了一些有用的人)
linger/ˈlɪŋɡɚ/v.逗留linger in one’s mind (留在某人心中)
livestock/ˈlaɪvˌstɑːk/n.家畜livestock farming (畜牧业) / Livestock farm (养殖场/饲养场)
methane/ˈmeθeɪn/n.甲烷，沼气methane emissions (甲烷排放)
mine/maɪn/v./n.矿coal mine (煤矿)
moth/mɔːθ/n.蛾moth balls (防蛀球)
onslaught/ˈɔːnˌslɔːt/n.攻击/猛攻The press launched another vicious onslaught on the president （新闻界对这位总统进行了新一轮的恶毒抨击）
outlying/ˈaʊtˌlaɪɪŋ/adj.偏远的outlying districts (偏远地区)
patronizing/ˈpætrəˌnaɪzɪŋ/adj.高人一等的patronizing attitude (居高临下的态度)
pictorial/pɪkˈtɔːrɪəl/adj.图片的pictorial representation (插图表示)
platelike/ˈpleɪtˌlaɪk/adj.板状的platelike structure (板状结构)
premature/ˌpriːməˈtʃʊr/adj.过早的premature birth (早产) / premature death(早逝/非自然死亡)
proliferate/prəˈlɪfəˌreɪt/v.激增articles on the subject has proliferated over the last year (过去一年以来，论及这一问题的文章大量涌现)
resin/ˈrezɪn/n.树脂pine resin (松树脂)
revere/rɪˈvɪr/v.崇敬revere as a god (尊为神) / The Chinese revered corn as a gift from heaven (中国人将谷物奉为天赐礼物)
sparse/spɑːrs/adj.稀疏的sparse population (稀疏的人口)
spectacle/ˈspektəkl/n.眼镜/奇观The sunset was a stunning spectacle (夕阳西斜，异常壮观)
strap/stræp/n./v.带子a watch with a leather strap (皮表带的手表)
tariff/ˈtærɪf/n.关税impose a tariff (征收关税)
thesis/ˈθiːsɪs/n.论文doctoral thesis (博士论文)
welfare/ˈwelfer/n.幸福/福利welfare state (福利国家) / We are concerned about the child’s welfare （我们关注那个孩子的福祉）

Word List 22 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
algebra/ˈældʒɪbrə/n.代数学algebra class (代数课)
cascade/kæˈskeɪd/n./v.瀑布/倾泻/连续cascade effect (级联效应)
chart/ʧɑːrt/n./v.图表/记录The exhibition charts the history of the palace (展览记载了这座王宫的历史)
circulation/ˌsɜːr.kjʊˈleɪ.ʃən/n.循环/发行数量blood circulation (血液循环)
complement/ˈkɑːmplɪmənt/n./v.补充complement each other (互补)
conductor/kənˈdʌktər/n.导体/指挥train conductor (火车司机) / Graphite is a highly efficient conductor of electricity (石墨是一种高效的电导体)
congress/ˈkɑːŋɡrɪs/n.国会the U.S. Congress (美国国会)
coupon/ˈkuːpɑːn/n.优惠券discount coupon (折扣券)
critique/krɪˈtiːk/n./v.评论literary critique (文学评论)
crown/kraʊn/n./v.王冠/加冕crown a king (加冕为王)
defect/‘di:feɪkt/n./v.缺陷He was born with a hearing defect (他天生听力就有缺陷)
dehydrated/diːˈhaɪdreɪtɪd/adj.脱水的dehydrated food (脱水食品)
distinctive/dɪˈstɪŋktɪv/adj.独特的the distinctive odour of chlorine (氯气的特殊气味)
drawbacks/ˈdrɔːbæk/n.缺点weigh the pros and cons/drawbacks (权衡利弊)
evolve/ɪˈvɑːlv/v.逐步发展/进化evolve from (由…进化而来)
expel/ɪkˈspel/v.驱逐expel from school (从学校开除)
extract/ɪkˈstrækt/ , /ˈekstrækt/n./v.提取extract information (提取信息)
fatal/ˈfet̬.əl/adj.致命的a fatal error (致命错误)
finalize/ˈfaɪ.nəl.aɪz/v.定稿/完成finalize a deal (完成一项交易)
flask/flæsk/n.瓶，烧瓶a flask of coffee (一瓶咖啡)
fluctuate/ˈflʌktʃueɪt/v.波动prices fluctuate (价格波动)
frugal/ˈfruː.ɡəl/adj.节俭的a frugal lifestyle (节俭的生活方式)
genetics/dʒɪˈnetɪks/n.遗传学study of genetics (遗传学的研究)
germinate/ˈdʒɝː.mə.neɪt/v.发芽/开始发展seeds germinate (种子发芽)
glorify/ˈɡlɔː.rə.faɪ/v.美化glorify the past (美化过去)
hawk/hɔːk/n./v.鹰/叫卖hawk goods (叫卖商品)
humanity/hjuːˈmæn.ə.t̬i/n.人类crimes against humanity (反人类罪)
jot/dʒɑːt/v./n.草草记下jot down notes (草草记下笔记)
lasting/ˈlæs.tɪŋ/adj.持久的lasting impression (持久的印象)
litter/ˈlɪt̬.ɚ/n./v.垃圾don’t litter (不乱丢垃圾)
machinery/məˈʃiː.nər.i/n.机器，机械heavy machinery (重型机械)
magnitude/ˈmæɡ.nə.tuːd/n.量级of great magnitude (重大的)
methanol/ˈmeθ.ə.nɑːl/n.甲醇methanol fuel (甲醇燃料)
microorganism/ˌmaɪ.kroʊˈɔːr.ɡə.nɪ.zəm/n.微生物harmful microorganism (有害微生物)
nightmare/ˈnaɪtˌmer/n.恶梦have a nightmare (做噩梦)
pertinent/ˈpɝː.t̬ən.ənt/adj.相关的pertinent information/questions (相关信息/问题)
plunge/plʌndʒ/v./n.突然跌落At least 50 people died when a bus plunged into a river （一辆公共汽车冲进了河里，至少有50人死亡）
reference/ˈref.ər.əns/n./v.提及/参考She made no reference to her illness (她没有谈论她的病) / reference book (参考书)
repute/rɪˈpjuːt/n./v.声望She is a writer of international repute (她是一位享有国际声誉的作家)
ridge/rɪdʒ/n.山脊ridge of a hill (山脊)
rodeo/ˈroʊ.di.oʊ/n.牛仔竞技表演attend a rodeo (参加牛仔竞技表演)
satellite/ˈsæt̬.əl.aɪt/n.卫星launch a satellite (发射一颗卫星)
satire/ˈsæt̬.aɪr/n.讽刺political satire (政治讽刺)
scarf/skɑːrf/n./v.围巾wear a scarf (戴围巾)
somewhat/ˈsʌm.wɑːt/adv.有点somewhat larger (稍大一些)
soothe/suːð/v.安抚/缓和soothe the pain (缓解疼痛)
sophisticated/səˈfɪs.tɪ.keɪ.t̬ɪd/adj.复杂的/精密的sophisticated technology (先进的技术)
spin/spɪn/v./n.旋转/纺织spin a web (结网)
spinet/ˈspɪn.ɪt/n.小型立式钢琴play the spinet (弹小型立式钢琴)
suite/swiːt/n.套房a suite of rooms/offices (一套房间/办公套房) / a hotel/private/honeymoon suite (旅馆/私人/蜜月套房)
trivial/ˈtrɪv.i.əl/adj.琐碎的trivial matter (琐事)
turn-out/ˈtɝːn.aʊt/n./v.出席人数high turn-out (高出席率)
turnpike/ˈtɝːn.paɪk/n.收费公路drive on the turnpike (在收费公路上驾驶)
unaided/ʌnˈeɪ.dɪd/adj.无助的/独立的unaided effort (独立的努力)
unsubstantiated/ˌʌn.səbˈstæn.ʃi.eɪ.t̬ɪd/adj.无事实依据的an unsubstantiated claim/rumour, etc (未经证实的说法/传言)
warp/wɔːrp/v./n.扭曲/变形Left out in the heat of the sun, tapes easily warp or get stuck in their cases (放在太阳底下暴晒后，磁带容易翘曲变形或卡带)

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 19 & 20
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 19 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
abrupt/əˈbrʌpt/adj.突然的abrupt change (突然的变化)
accessory/əkˈsesəri/n.配件，附件fashion accessories (时尚配饰)
antibiotic/ˌæntibaɪˈɒtɪk/n.抗生素antibiotic therapy (抗生素疗法)
bond/bɒnd/n./v.纽带/债券form a bond (形成纽带)
cafeteria/ˌkæfɪˈtiəriə/n.自助餐厅school cafeteria (学校餐厅)
compromise/ˈkɒmprəmaɪz/n./v.和解reach a compromise (达成妥协)
constricted/kənˈstrɪktɪd/adj.受限制的Film-makers of the time were constricted by the censors (那时的电影制作人受到了审查官的限制)
discern/dɪˈsɜːrn/v.辨别，识别discern the truth (辨别真相)
documentary/ˌdɒkjʊˈmentəri/n.纪录片watch a documentary (看纪录片)
domestic/dəˈmestɪk/adj.国内的domestic flight (国内航班)
draft/drɑːft/n./v.草稿/起草draft a proposal (起草提案)
elective/ɪˈlɛktɪv/n./adj.选修课elective course (选修课)
enlightment/ɪnˈlaɪtənmənt/n.启蒙the Age of Enlightenment (启蒙时代)
equitable/ˈekwɪtəbəl/adj.公正的equitable treatment (公平待遇)
estate/ɪˈsteɪt/n.财产/庄园real estate (房地产)
fresco/ˈfrɛskoʊ/n.壁画Sistine Chapel frescoes (西斯廷礼拜堂的壁画)
frivolity/frɪˈvɒlɪti/n.轻浮acts of frivolity (轻浮的行为)
hazel/ˈheɪzl/n./adj.榛树/淡褐色的hazel eyes (淡褐色的眼睛)
herbivore/ˈhɜːrbɪvɔːr/n.草食动物herbivorous dinosaur (草食恐龙)
huddle/ˈhʌdəl/v./n.聚在一起huddle together (挤在一起)
hue/hjuː/n.色彩various hues of blue (各种蓝色的色调)
inflation/ɪnˈfleɪʃən/n.通货膨胀high inflation rate (高通胀率)
instructor/ɪnˈstrʌktər/n.指导者/讲师fitness instructor (健身教练)
leather/ˈlɛðər/n.皮革leather jacket (皮革夹克)
liberate/ˈlɪbəreɪt/v.解放liberate a city (解放一座城市)
mansion/ˈmænʃən/n.大厦/豪宅mansion house (大厦)
mottled/ˈmɑːtld/adj.斑驳的mottled skin (斑驳的皮肤)
noted/ˈnoʊtɪd/adj.著名的a noted historian (知名的历史学家)
oceanographer/ˌoʊʃəˈnɑːɡrəfər/n.海洋学家-
paralyze(paralyse)/ˈpærəlaɪz/v.使瘫痪paralyze the economy (使经济瘫痪)
parasite/ˈpærəsaɪt/n.寄生虫intestinal parasites (肠道寄生虫)
prescribe/prɪˈskraɪb/v.开处方prescribe medication (开药方)
regenerate/rɪˈdʒɛnəˌreɪt/v.使复兴/重建The government will continue to try to regenerate inner-city areas (政府将继续努力重建市区内部)
resilience/rɪˈzɪliəns/n.适应力，恢复力emotional resilience (情绪恢复力)
rhyme/raɪm/n./v.韵脚rhyme scheme (韵脚方案)
shade/ʃeɪd/n./v.阴凉处Let’s sit in the shade for a while (咱们在阴凉处坐一会儿吧)
sow/soʊ/v./n.播种sow the seeds (播种)
substitute/ˈsʌbstɪˌtut/v./n.替代substitute teacher (代课教师)
sustained/səˈsteɪnd/adj.持续的sustained effort (持续的努力)
tundra/ˈtʌndrə/n.冻原Tundra is flat land with very little vegetation (苔原是平坦的土地，植被稀少)
vessel/ˈvɛsl/n.船/血管blood vessel (血管)
voracious/vəˈreɪʃəs/adj.贪婪的voracious reader (酷爱阅读的人)

Word List 20 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
abound/əˈbaʊnd/v.充满The lakes abound with fish (这些湖泊盛产鱼)
amble/ˈæmbəl/v./n.漫步，闲逛amble around (四处闲逛)
beam/biːm/n./v.光束beam of light (光束)
bellow/ˈbɛloʊ/v./n.吼叫/风箱bellow with rage (愤怒地咆哮)
cape/keɪp/n.海角Cape of Good Hope (好望角)
caterpillar/ˈkætərpɪlər/n.毛毛虫The caterpillar will eventually metamorphose into a butterfly (毛毛虫最终将蜕变成一只蝴蝶)
characteristic/ˌkærɪktəˈrɪstɪk/n./adj.特征/典型的Genes determine the characteristics of every living thing (基因决定每个生物的特征) / Windmills are a characteristic feature of the Mallorcan landscape (风车是马略卡岛风光的一个典型的特色)
colonize/ˈkɑːləˌnaɪz/v.殖民/开拓colonize a planet (开拓一颗行星)
delay/dɪˈleɪ/v./n.推迟delay a project (推迟一个项目)
eclecticism/ɪˈklɛktɪˌsɪzəm/n.折衷主义-
elasticity/ɪˌlæstɪˈsɪti/n.弹性the skin’s elasticity (皮肤弹性)
embellish/ɪmˈbɛlɪʃ/v.装饰Ivy leaves embellish the front of the dresser (长春藤树叶装饰着梳妆台的正面)
endangered/ɪnˈdeɪndʒərd/adj.濒临灭绝的endangered species (濒危物种)
evacuation/ɪˌvækjuˈeɪʃən/n.撤离emergency evacuation (紧急撤离)
exploit/ɪkˈsplɔɪt/v./n.利用/剥削to prevent exploitation (阻止剥削)
facade/fəˈsɑːd/n.（建筑物的）正面Squalor and poverty lay behind the city’s glittering façade (表面的繁华掩盖了这座城市的肮脏和贫穷)
fracture/ˈfræktʃər/v./n.断裂/骨折bone fracture (骨折)
guideline/ˈɡaɪdˌlaɪn/n.指导方针follow the guidelines (遵循指导方针)
horn/hɔːrn/n.角horn of a rhinoceros (犀牛角)
hurl/hɜːrl/v.猛掷Simon caught the grenade and hurled it back (西蒙接住手榴弹，把它掷了回去)
indispensable/ɪndɪˈspɛnsəbl/adj.不可缺少的indispensable part of (不可缺少的一部分)
inferior/ɪnˈfɪriər/adj.较差的inferior to (比…差)
inflammation/ɪnfləˈmeɪʃən/n.炎症skin inflammation (皮肤炎)
informed/ɪnˈfɔːrmd/adj.了解情况的stay informed (保持知情)
irreverent/ɪˈrɛvərənt/adj.不敬的，无礼的irreverent behavior (无礼的行为)
maglev/ˈmæɡlɛv/n.磁浮列车-
maize/meɪz/n.玉米-
mime/maɪm/v./n.做哑剧mime artist (哑剧艺术家)
molten/ˈmoʊltən/adj.熔融的molten lava (熔岩)
oval/ˈoʊvəl/n./adj.椭圆形的oval shape (椭圆形状)
pinpoint/ˈpɪnpɔɪnt/v./n.精确指出to pinpoint the problem (精确指出问题) / pinpoint one’s precise location (指出他的确切位置)
projector/prəˈdʒɛktər/n.投影仪-
radioactive/ˌreɪdioʊˈæktɪv/adj.放射性的radioactive material (放射性物质)
rattle/ˈrætl/v./n.发出嘎嘎声rattle the windows (震动窗户)
reconstruction/ˌriːkənˈstrʌkʃən/n.重建reconstruction of a building (一座建筑的重建)
reform/rɪˈfɔːrm/v./n.改革economic reform (经济改革)
silicate/ˈsɪlɪkət/n.硅酸盐silicate minerals (硅酸盐矿物)
situated/ˈsɪtʃuˌeɪtəd/adj.位于situated on the coast (位于海岸上)
slog/slɑːg/v.艰难行进slog through the mud (在泥地中艰难行进)
stake/steɪk/n./v.风险/赌注have a stake in (在…中有份额) / high stakes (高赌注)
tableland/ˈteɪbəlˌlænd/n.高原-
testimony/ˈtɛstɪˌmoʊni/n.证词give testimony (作证)
thrifty/ˈθrɪfti/adj.节俭的a thrifty lifestyle (节俭的生活方式)
tinker/ˈtɪŋkər/v./n.修补tinker with the engine (修补引擎)
turbulent/ˈtɜːrbjələnt/adj.动荡的a turbulent part of the world （动荡不安的地区）/ a turbulent sea/storm （波涛汹涌的大海/狂风暴雨）
unconsolidated/ˌʌnkənˈsɑːlɪdeɪtɪd/adj.疏松的unconsolidated soil (未固化的土壤)

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 17 & 18
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 17 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
allergy/ˈælərdʒi/n.过敏症have a nut allergy (对坚果过敏)
arid/ˈærɪd/adj.干旱的arid and semi-arid deserts (干旱和半干旱的沙漠) / arid climate (干燥的气候)
aroma/əˈroʊmə/n.香味aroma of coffee (咖啡的香味)
aviation/ˌeɪviˈeɪʃn/n.航空aviation industry (航空工业)
bedrock/ˈbɛdrɑːk/n.基岩/基础bedrock of society (社会基石)
cardinal/ˈkɑːrdɪnəl/adj./n.基本的/红衣主教cardinal rule (基本规则) / He was appointed a cardinal (他被任命为红衣主教)
carnivore/ˈkɑːrnɪvɔːr/n.食肉动物carnivore diet (食肉动物的饮食)
certificate/sərˈtɪfɪkət/n.证书graduation certificate (毕业证书)
contract/ˈkɑːntrækt/n./v.合同sign a contract (签署合同)
convex/ˈkɑːnvɛks/adj.凸出的convex lens (凸透镜)
criticize/ˈkrɪtɪsaɪz/v.批评criticize someone’s behavior (批评某人的行为)
dealer/ˈdiːlər/n.经销商car dealer (汽车经销商)
defecate/ˈdiːfɪkeɪt/v.排便
dismay/dɪsˈmeɪ/n./v.沮丧to my dismay (让我感到沮丧的是) / hide her dismay at the result (掩饰对结果的沮丧不安)
flake/fleɪk/n./v.小薄片/剥落snow flake (雪花)
flourish/ˈflʌrɪʃ/v./n.繁荣economy is flourishing (经济正在繁荣)
geology/dʒiˈɑːlədʒi/n.地质学study geology (学习地质学)
glaze/ɡleɪz/v./n.上釉，光滑表面glaze a pottery (给陶器上釉)
grading/ˈɡreɪdɪŋ/n.评分grading system (评分系统)
harsh/hɑːrʃ/adj.严酷的/刺耳的harsh criticism (严厉的批评)
hind/haɪnd/adj./n.后面的hind legs (后腿)
hominid/ˈhɑːmɪnɪd/n.原始人类
illegible/ɪˈlɛdʒɪbəl/adj.难以辨认的illegible handwriting (难以辨认的笔迹)
incoming/ˈɪnkʌmɪŋ/adj./n.即将来临的incoming tide (即将来临的潮汐)
inherit/ɪnˈhɛrɪt/v.继承/遗传inherit a fortune (继承一笔财产)
intellectual/ˌɪntəˈlɛkʧuəl/adj./n.知识分子intellectual property (知识产权)
legible/ˈlɛdʒɪbəl/adj.(字迹)清晰可辨的My handwriting isn’t very legible (我写的字不太好认)
lime/laɪm/n./v.石灰/酸橙lime juice (酸橙汁)
livelihood/ˈlaɪvlihʊd/n.谋生手段earn a livelihood (谋生)
lizard/ˈlɪzərd/n.蜥蜴-
maturity/məˈtʊrɪti/n.成熟，到期reach maturity (达到成熟)
militant/ˈmɪlɪtənt/adj./n.激进的/好战的militant group (激进组织)
mosaic/moʊˈzeɪɪk/n./adj.马赛克mosaic artwork (马赛克艺术品)
paraphrase/ˈpærəfreɪz/v./n.释义，转述paraphrase a text (转述一段文字)
pebble/ˈpɛbəl/n.鹅卵石
posthumous/ˈpoʊsthjuːməs/adj.死后的a posthumous award for bravery (死后荣膺的英勇奖)
preoccupation/ˌpriːɑːkjuːˈpeɪʃn/n.关注/全神贯注preoccupation with work (对工作的全神贯注)
publicize/ˈpʌblɪsaɪz/v.宣传publicize an event (宣传一个事件)
recipe/ˈrɛsɪpi/n.食谱recipe book (食谱书)
rekindle/riːˈkɪndl/v.重新点燃rekindle an old friendship (重燃旧友情)
rental/ˈrɛntl/n./adj.租金，出租的rental car (租赁的汽车)
revision/rɪˈvɪʒn/n.修订revision of a book (书籍的修订)
rites/raɪts/n.仪式funeral rites (葬礼仪式)
rugged/ˈrʌgɪd/adj.崎岖的rugged terrain (崎岖的地形)
sanitation/ˌsænɪˈteɪʃn/n.公共卫生，卫生设施sanitation services (卫生服务)
skeletal/ˈskɛlɪtl/adj.骨架的skeletal structure (骨架结构)
stark/stɑːrk/adj.鲜明的stark contrast (鲜明的对比)
sunset/ˈsʌnˌsɛt/n.日落sunset view (日落景观)
swell/swɛl/v./n.膨胀/波浪swell of the sea (海浪的涌动)
tactic/ˈtæktɪk/n.策略negotiation tactics (谈判策略)
undertake/ˌʌndərˈteɪk/v.承担undertake a task (承担一项任务)
vestige/ˈvɛstɪdʒ/n.残留部分；遗迹vestige of an old civilization (古老文明的遗迹)

Word List 18 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
adjacent/əˈdʒeɪsənt/adj.相邻的adjacent rooms (相邻的房间)
applicant/ˈæplɪkənt/n.申请人applicant for a job (求职者)
aquatic/əˈkwætɪk/adj.水生的aquatic animals (水生动物)
asteroid/ˈæstərɔɪd/n.小行星asteroid belt (小行星带)
chronical/ˈkrɑːnɪkəl/adj.慢性的chronical diseases (慢性疾病)
clam/klæm/n.蛤，蚌clam chowder (蛤蜊烩汤)
compound/ˈkɒmpaʊnd/n./v.合成物/复合的Organic compounds contain carbon in their molecules (有机化合物的分子里含碳)
considerable/kənˈsɪdərəbəl/adj.相当大的/重要的considerable amount (相当大的数量)
consistent/kənˈsɪstənt/adj.连续的consistent performance (连续稳定的表现)
constituent/kənˈstɪtʃuənt/n.选民She has the full support of her constituents (她得到本区选民的全力支持)
dazzling/ˈdæzlɪŋ/adj.令人眩目的dazzling light (刺眼的光)
decadent/ˈdɛkədənt/adj.堕落的/贪图享乐的a decadent lifestyle/society (堕落的生活方式/腐朽的社会)
displace/dɪsˈpleɪs/v.取代/使背井离乡factory workers have been displaced by machines (工厂的工人已逐渐被机器取代)
drift/drɪft/v./n.漂流，漂移drift off to sleep (渐渐入睡)
executive/ɪɡˈzɛkjʊtɪv/n./adj.主管executive director (执行董事)
extol/ɪkˈstoʊl/v.高度赞扬Doctors often extol the virtues of eating less fat (医生常常宣扬少吃脂肪的好处)
extrinsic/ɪkˈstrɪnsɪk/adj.外在的extrinsic value (外在价值) / extrinsic factors (外在因素)
formulate/ˈfɔːrmjuleɪt/v.形成，制定formulate a plan (制定计划)
fragment/ˈfræɡmənt/n./v.片段，碎片；破碎fragment of memory (记忆的片段)
gear/ɡɪr/n./v.齿轮/调整gear up for (为…做好准备)
gibe/dʒaɪb/n./v.嘲笑，讥笑gibe at someone (嘲笑某人)
glean/ɡliːn/v.搜集（信息、知识等）We’re gleaning information from all sources (我们正从所有渠道慢慢收集信息)
gourmet/ɡɔːrˈmeɪ/n.美食家gourmet food (美食)
herd/hɝːd/n./v.群；放牧herd of sheep (羊群)
hive/haɪv/n.蜂巢bee hive (蜂巢)
insistence/ɪnˈsɪstəns/n.坚持insistence on perfection (对完美的坚持)
intimate/ˈɪntɪmət/adj./n./v.亲密的intimate relationship (亲密的关系)
ledge/lɛdʒ/n.棱window ledge (窗棱)
leisure/ˈliːʒər/n.休闲leisure activities (休闲活动)
lore/lɔːr/n.传说，民间故事folklore (民间传说)
magma/ˈmæɡmə/n.岩浆magma chamber (岩浆室)
malnutrition/ˌmælnʊˈtrɪʃən/n.营养不良malnutrition in children (儿童营养不良)
mountainous/ˈmaʊntɪnəs/adj.多山的mountainous region (山区)
neon/ˈniːɒn/n.氖/霓虹灯neon light (霓虹灯)
plantation/plænˈteɪʃən/n.种植园，农场sugar plantation (糖厂)
pocketbook/ˈpɒkɪtbʊk/n.钱包/经济状况impact on the pocketbook (对经济状况的影响)
portray/pɔːrˈtreɪ/v.描绘portray a character (扮演一个角色)
probe/proʊb/n./v.航天探测器/调查probe into (调查)
purity/ˈpjʊrɪti/n.纯净purity of water (水的纯净度)
reservation/ˌrezərˈveɪʃən/n.预订/保留make a reservation (做预订)
scarce/skers/adj.稀有的scarce resources (稀缺资源)
smelting/ˈsmeltɪŋ/n.熔炼smelting iron (熔炼铁)
stash/stæʃ/v./n.秘藏stash away money (藏钱)
submission/səbˈmɪʃən/n.提交/屈服，投降submission of a paper (提交论文)
suppress/səˈprɛs/v.抑制/镇压suppress emotions (抑制情绪)
surpass/sərˈpæs/v.超越surpass expectations (超越期待)
tarnish/ˈtɑːrnɪʃ/v./n.使失去光泽/玷污tarnish one’s reputation (玷污名誉)
timber/ˈtɪmbər/n./v.木材timber industry (木材行业)
trait/treɪt/n.特征，特点personality trait (个性特点)
uneven/ʌnˈiːvən/adj.不平均的/不均匀的uneven surface (不平均的表面)
virtually/ˈvɜːrtʃʊəli/adv.实际上，几乎virtually impossible (几乎不可能)

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 15 & 16
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 15 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
code/koʊd/n.代码/法典code of laws (法典) / bar code (条形码)
compliment/ˈkɑːmplɪmənt/n./v.赞美pay a compliment (赞美某人)
deadly/ˈdɛdli/adj.致命的a deadly disease (致命病症)
dilute/daɪˈlut/v.稀释dilute the solution (稀释溶液)
dismal/ˈdɪzməl/adj.阴沉的dismal conditions/surroundings/weather (悲惨的状况/凄凉的环境/阴沉的天气)
dubious/ˈduːbiəs/adj.可疑的I was rather dubious about the idea (我对这想法持怀疑态度)
dye/daɪ/n./v.染色dye fabric (染布)
elm/ɛlm/n.榆树elm tree (榆树)
extremity/ɪkˈstrɛmɪti/n.极端in the extremity of despair (极度绝望) / the eastern extremity of the mountain range (湖位于山脉最东端)
faint/feɪnt/adj./v.微弱的/昏厥faint sound (微弱的声音)
gravel/ˈɡrævəl/n.砾石sand and gravel (沙砾)
hardy/ˈhɑːrdi/adj.能吃苦耐劳的a hardy plant (耐寒的植物)
hemp/hɛmp/n.大麻hemp fiber (大麻纤维)
impose/ɪmˈpoʊz/v.征收impose a tax (征税)
incinerate/ɪnˈsɪnəreɪt/v.焚烧incinerate waste (焚烧垃圾)
inherent/ɪnˈhɪrənt/adj.内在的inherent risk (内在风险)
inhibit/ɪnˈhɪbɪt/v.抑制inhibit growth (抑制生长)
kennel/ˈkɛnəl/n.犬舍dog kennel (狗窝)
lodge/loʊdʒ/n./v.小屋hunting lodge (猎人小屋)
mast/mæst/n.桅杆ship mast (船桅)
modest/ˈmɑːdɪst/adj.谦虚的a modest proposal (谦虚的提议)
needy/ˈniːdi/adj.贫穷的help the needy (帮助贫困的人)
noxious/ˈnɑːkʃəs/adj.有害的noxious gases (有毒气体) / noxious fumes (有毒烟雾)
ore/ɔːr/n.矿石iron ore (铁矿石)
posit/ˈpɑːzɪt/v.断定/假设He posits that chemical elements radiate electromagnetic signals (他假定化学元素放射电磁信号)
provision/prəˈvɪʒən/n.供应provision of food (食物供应)
recharge/riːˈtʃɑːrdʒ/v.再充电recharge a battery (充电)
rendition/rɛnˈdɪʃən/n.演绎a rendition of a song (一首歌的演绎)
reproduce/ˌriːprəˈduːs/v.复制reproduce a painting (复制一幅画)
sacred/ˈseɪkrɪd/adj.神圣的/宗教的sacred music (宗教音乐)
secrete/sɪˈkriːt/v.分泌secrete hormones (分泌激素)
sedentary/ˈsɛdntɛri/adj.久坐的a sedentary job/occupation/lifestyle (倾向于久坐的工作/职业/生活方式)
shatter/ˈʃætər/v.粉碎the sound of shattering glass (玻璃破碎的声音)
staple/ˈsteɪpəl/n./adj.主要的staple food (主食)
stellar/ˈstɛlər/adj.星的Stellar evolution (星演化)
tantalizing/ˈtæntəˌlaɪzɪŋ/adj.诱人的A tantalizing aroma of roast beef fills the air (烤牛肉诱人的香味弥漫在空气中)
tectonics/tɛkˈtɑːnɪks/n.地壳构造学plate tectonics (板块构造理论)
torpor/ˈtɔːrpər/n.迟钝/麻木He had slumped into a state of torpor from which nothing could rouse him (他陷入了一种麻木状态，什么事都不能唤起他的兴趣)

Word List 16 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
absorption/əbˈsɔːrpʃən/n.吸收absorption of knowledge (知识的吸收)
adjunct/ˈædʒʌŋkt/n./adj.补充Physical therapy is an important adjunct to drug treatments
archaeology/ˌɑːrkiˈɑːlədʒi/n.考古学study archaeology (学习考古学)
barter/ˈbɑːrtər/v./n.以物易物The local people bartered wheat for tools
besiege/bɪˈsiːdʒ/v.围攻besiege the castle (围攻城堡)
bouquet/buːˈkeɪ/n.花束a bouquet of flowers (一束花)
convict/ˈkɑːnvɪkt/v./n.定罪convict a criminal (判定罪犯有罪)
cookout/ˈkʊkaʊt/n.户外烧烤have a cookout (举办烧烤活动)
cylinder/ˈsɪlɪndər/n.圆筒a cylinder of gas (一筒气体)
decay/dɪˈkeɪ/v./n.腐烂decay of wood (木头腐烂)
derive/dɪˈraɪv/v.源于derive from a source (源于一个来源)
dispersal/dɪˈspɜːrsəl/n.传播dispersal of seeds (种子的传播)
domesticate/dəˈmɛstɪˌkeɪt/v.驯养domesticate animals (驯养动物)
elicit/ɪˈlɪsɪt/v.引出elicit a response (引出回应)
eviscerate/ɪˈvɪsəreɪt/v.取出内脏eviscerate a fish (取出鱼的内脏)
gorilla/ɡəˈrɪlə/n.大猩猩a troop of gorillas (一群大猩猩)
hinterland/ˈhɪntərˌlænd/n.内陆the hinterland of a city (城市的腹地)
integral/ˈɪntɪɡrəl/adj.完整的an integral part (不可或缺的一部分)
lash/læʃ/v./n.鞭打The rain lashed at the windows (雨点猛烈地打在窗户上)
lure/lʊr/v./n.引诱lure someone into a trap (引诱某人进入陷阱)
minute/ˈmɪnɪt/ or /maɪˈnjuːt/adj.微小的a minute detail (微小的细节)
modem/ˈmoʊdəm/n.调制解调器connect to the internet via a modem
neuron/ˈnʊərɒn/n.神经元neuron connections (神经元连接)
notwithstanding/ˌnɒtwɪθˈstændɪŋ/prep./conj./adv.尽管He went to work notwithstanding his illness
opposite/ˈɒpəzɪt/adj./n./prep.相反的opposite direction (相反方向)
periphery/pəˈrɪfəri/n.边缘the periphery of a city (城市的周边)
prairie/ˈprɛri/n.大草原prairie ecosystem (草原生态系统)
predator/ˈprɛdətər/n.捕食者top predator (顶级捕食者)
prehistoric/ˌpriːhɪˈstɒrɪk/adj.史前的prehistoric creatures (史前生物)
prodigious/prəˈdɪdʒəs/adj.巨大的a prodigious achievement/memory/talent (惊人的成就/记忆力/才华)
ration/ˈræʃən/n./v.定量供应We’re on short rations (我们的口粮定量不足)
raven/ˈreɪvən/n.大乌鸦a flock of ravens (一群乌鸦)
remark/rɪˈmɑːrk/v./n.评论make a remark (做出评论)
Saturn/ˈsætɜːrn/n.土星rings of Saturn (土星的环)
sprout/spraʊt/v./n.发芽sprout new ideas (萌发新想法)
stalk/stɔːk/v./n.跟踪/茎stalk a prey (跟踪一只猎物)
stiff/stɪf/adj.僵硬的/严厉的I’ve got a stiff neck / stiff punishment
velocity/vɪˈlɒsɪti/n.速度high velocity wind
versatile/ˈvɜːrsətaɪl/adj.多才多艺的versatile performer (全能的表演者)

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 13 & 14
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 13🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
addictive/əˈdɪktɪv/adj.使人上瘾的addictive drug / Cigarettes are highly addictive
airborne/ˈer.bɔːrn/adj.空气传播的airborne particles/seeds/viruses / Do not leave your seat until the plane is airborne
bark/bɑːrk/n.树皮bark of a tree
beverage/ˈbev.ɚ.ɪdʒ/n.饮料hot beverage
bold/boʊld/adj.大胆的be bold enough to
comply/kəmˈplaɪ/v.遵守comply with the rules
comprise/kəmˈpraɪz/v.由…组成be comprised of
conceal/kənˈsiːl/v.隐藏conceal the truth
contour/ˈkɑːn.tʊr/n.轮廓the contour of a face
crumple/ˈkrʌmpəl/v.弄皱crumple a paper
depot/ˈdiː.poʊ/n.贮藏处A depot is a bus station or train station
deserted/dɪˈzɝː.t̬ɪd/adj.荒废的a deserted house / a deserted village
dilate/daɪˈleɪt/v.扩大，膨胀dilate the pupils / Her eyes dilated with fear
diversification/daɪˌvɜːrsɪfɪˈkeɪʃ(ə)n/n.多样化business diversification
expressly/ɪkˈspres.li/adv.明确地She was expressly forbidden to touch my papers
facility/fəˈsɪl.ə.t̬i/n.设施fitness facility / What recreational facilities are now available?
finch/fɪntʃ/n.雀科鸟类a flock of finches
frigid/ˈfrɪdʒ.ɪd/adj.寒冷的frigid temperatures / frigid air
furnace/ˈfɝː.nɪs/n.炉子heat the house with a furnace
gasoline/ˈɡæs.ə.liːn/n.汽油a gallon of gasoline
hay/heɪ/n.干草a bale of hay (一大捆干草)
hemisphere/ˈhem.ɪ.sfɪr/n.半球northern hemisphere
hieratic/ˌhaɪəˈrætɪk/adj.僧侣的Hieratic life
inheritance/ɪnˈherɪtəns/n.遗产/继承receive an inheritance (接收遗产) / cultural inheritance
legislature/ˈleʤɪˌsleɪʧər/n.立法机关the national/state legislature
metric/ˈmetrɪk/n.公制的The metric system is the system of measurement that uses metres, grams, and litres
metropolitan/ˌmetrəˈpɑlɪtən/adj./n.都市的the New York metropolitan area
mythical/ˈmɪθɪkəl/adj.神话的mythical creature (神话生物)
offspring/ˈɔːfsprɪŋ/n.后代the offspring of a lion (狮子的后代)
pamphlet/ˈpæmflɪt/n.小册子distribute pamphlets
petroleum/pəˈtroʊliəm/n.石油petroleum industry
pharmacy/ˈfɑːrməsi/n.药店go to the pharmacy
recurring/rɪˈkɝːrɪŋ/adj.重复的If something recurs, it happens more than once / a theme that was to recur frequently in his work
refraction/rɪˈfrækʃən/n.折射refraction of light / reflection of light
retreat/rɪˈtriːt/n./v.撤退tactical retreat
sanctuary/ˈsæŋktʃuˌɛri/n.避难所a bird/wildlife sanctuary
stanza/ˈstænzə/n.（诗的）节，段stanza of a poem
substantive/ˈsʌbstəntɪv/adj.实质性的substantive evidence / to begin substantive negotiations
unravel/ʌnˈrævəl/v.解开unravel a mystery
veil/veɪl/n./v.面纱/掩盖behind the veil

Word List 14 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
abrasion/əˈbreɪʒən/n.磨损abrasion of the skin / Diamonds have extreme resistance to abrasion
absenteeism/ˌæbsənˈtiːɪzəm/n.缺席，旷工reduce absenteeism in schools and workplaces
acclaim/əˈkleɪm/v./n.喝彩，赞扬win/acquire acclaim (赢得/获得赞誉) / The work was acclaimed as a masterpiece
brass/brɑːs/n.黄铜brass instrument
coincide/koʊɪnˈsaɪd/v.一致/同时发生The interests of employers and employees do not always coincide
colony/ˈkɑːləni/n.殖民地/群British colonies (英国殖民地) / a colony of ants (蚂蚁群)
concave/kɑːnˈkeɪv/adj./n.凹的concave lens
demanding/dɪˈmændɪŋ/adj.要求高的demanding task
dogged/ˈdɔːɡɪd/adj.顽强的They have, through sheer dogged determination, slowly gained respect for their efforts
drain/dreɪn/v./n.排水，耗尽Miners built the tunnel to drain water out of the mines / Now the focus is on draining the water
drowsy/ˈdraʊzi/adj.昏昏欲睡的feel drowsy
elevation/ˌelɪˈveɪʃən/n.高度elevation of a mountain
elongate/iːˈlɔːŋɡeɪt/v.延长elongate a wire
grace/ɡreɪs/n./v.优雅/风度She didn’t fit in and she had few social graces / He moved with the grace of a trained boxer
hitherto/ˌhɪðərˈtuː/adv.迄今为止a hitherto unknown species
idle/ˈaɪdl/adj./v.闲置的/懈怠的idle chat (闲聊) / Now the machine is lying idle (现在这台机器正处于闲置状态)
inanity/ɪˈnænəti/n.空虚 /愚蠢inanity of life / Their statement was a downright inanity
insulin/ˈɪnsʊlɪn/n.胰岛素Insulin is a substance that most people produce naturally in their body and that controls the level of sugar in their blood
inviting/ɪnˈvaɪtɪŋ/adj.诱人的an inviting smile / The waters of the tropics are invitingly clear
lettuce/ˈlɛtɪs/n.生菜lettuce salad
cilantro*/*sɪˈlɑːntroʊ/n.香菜叶It’s green pepper, cilantro, and cucumbers
coriander/ˌkɔːriˈændər/n.香菜The chicken was garnished with coriander and red chilli
mason/ˈmeɪsən/n.石匠/泥瓦匠mason is a person who is skilled at making things or building things with stone or bricks
metallic/mɪˈtælɪk/adj.金属的There was a metallic taste at the back of his throat (他喉咙深处有一股金属的腥味)
monastery/ˈmɔːnəsteri/n.修道院A monastery is a building or collection of buildings in which monks live / Buddhist monastery
narrative/ˈnærətɪv/n./adj.叙述/叙述的a gripping narrative of their journey up the Amazon / The novel contains too much dialogue and not enough narrative
nourish/ˈnɜːrɪʃ/v.养育The food she eats nourishes both her and the baby
penetrate/ˈpɛnɪˌtreɪt/v.穿透The sun’s radiation penetrates the skin
realm/rɛlm/n.领域/王国in the realm of
rug/rʌg/n.地毯a woolen rug
sac/sæk/n.囊，袋The lungs consist of millions of tiny air sacs (肺包含数百万个小肺泡)
satiric/səˈtɪrɪk/adj.讽刺的satiric comment
shed/ʃɛd/v./n.掉落/棚shed light on / a bicycle shed
smother/ˈsmʌðər/v.把 (火) 闷熄/使窒息smother a fire / e tried to smother me with a pillow
sore/sɔr/adj./n.疼痛的a sore throat
sustain/səˈsteɪn/v.维持/承受sustain a loss
swarm/swɔrm/n./v.群/密集swarm of bees
translucent/trænsˈluːsnt/adj.半透明的translucent glass
untamed/ʌnˈteɪmd/adj.未被驯服的untamed nature

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 11 & 12
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 11 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
amenity/əˈmiːnɪti/n.便利设施，舒适设施local amenities (当地设施)
avalanche/ˈævəlæntʃ/n.雪崩trigger an avalanche (触发雪崩)
bald/bɔːld/adj.秃的bald eagle (秃鹰)
bolster/ˈboʊlstər/v.支持，加固to bolster sb’s confidence/courage/morale (增加某人的信心/勇气/士气)
ceramic/sɪˈræmɪk/adj./n.陶瓷的ceramic ware (陶瓷器)
confer/kənˈfɜːr/v.协商，授予confer an honour (授予荣誉)
crawl/krɔːl/v.爬行，缓慢前进crawl into bed (爬上床)
deception/dɪˈsɛpʃən/n.欺骗，骗局a drama full of lies and deception (充满谎言和欺骗的一出戏)
dictate/ˈdɪkteɪt/v./n.命令，规定/命令dictate a letter (口述一封信)
editorial/ˌɛdɪˈtɔːriəl/n./adj.社论write an editorial (写社论)
electrode/ɪˈlɛktroʊd/n.电极positive electrode (阳极)
enactment/ɪˈnæktmənt/n.颁布，实行the enactment of a law (法律的实施)
erect/ɪˈrɛkt/v./adj.建立/直立的erect a monument (建立纪念碑)
excursion/ɪkˈskɜːrʒn/n.短途旅行a school excursion (学校短途旅行)
favored/ˈfeɪvərd/adj.受喜爱的favored candidate (公众喜爱的候选人)
ferment/fərˈmɛnt/v./n.发酵/动乱ferment beer (啤酒发酵)
fertile/ˈfɜːrtəl/adj.肥沃的fertile soil (肥沃的土壤)
genesis/ˈdʒɛnɪsɪs/n.起源，发生genesis of a plan (计划的起源)
invertebrate/ɪnˈvɜːrtɪbrət/n.无脊椎动物study of invertebrates (无脊椎动物的研究)
latter/ˈlætər/adj./n.后者的，后者in the latter case (在后者的情况下)
listless/ˈlɪstləs/adj.无精打采的He was listless and pale and wouldn’t eat much (他无精打采，脸色苍白，而且食欲不振)
mechanist/ˈmekənɪst/n.机械师a skilled mechanist (熟练的机械师)
merchandise/ˈmɜːrtʃəndaɪs/n./v.商品，销售Retailers can return defective merchandise (零售商可以退回有瑕疵的商品)
receptacle/rɪˈsɛptəkl/n.容器，接收器receptacle for trash (垃圾容器)
reliever/rɪˈliːvər/n.缓解剂Tea is a good stress-reliever
revolt/rɪˈvoʊlt/v./n.反抗，起义a peasant revolt (农民起义)
ribbon/ˈrɪbən/n.彩带，丝带tied with a pink ribbon (用粉色丝带绑起来)
segregate/ˈsɛgrɪgeɪt/v.分离segregate waste (废物分离)
skeptical/ˈskɛptɪkəl/adj.怀疑的，多疑的skeptical about the results (对结果持怀疑态度)
soprano/səˈprænoʊ/n./adj.女高音，最高音部a soprano singer (女高音歌手)
spun/spʌn/v.纺织，旋转（spin的过去式和过去分词）the wheel spun around (轮子旋转着)
sterile/ˈstɛrəl/adj.无菌的，贫瘠的sterile surgical instruments (无菌的手术器械) / sterile bandages (消毒绷带)
subtle/ˈsʌtəl/adj.微妙的，精细的a subtle difference (微妙的差别)
thorn/θɔːrn/n.刺，荆棘a rose without thorns (无刺的玫瑰)
troupe/truːp/n.剧团，舞团a dance troupe (舞蹈团)
twine/twaɪn/n./v.麻线，缠绕twine a rope around a pole (绕柱缠绳)
utmost/ˈʌtmoʊst/adj./n.最大的do one’s utmost (尽某人的最大努力)
vacancy/ˈveɪkənsi/n.空缺，空位job vacancy (工作空缺)
vapour/ˈveɪpər/n.水汽，蒸气water vapour (水蒸气)
verbal/ˈvɝːbəl/adj.口头的，言语的verbal agreement (口头协议)
voyage/ˈvɔɪɪdʒ/n./v.航行，航程a long voyage (长途航行)
yield/jiːld/v./n.生产，产量yield to pressure (屈服于压力)

Word List 12 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
adhesive/ədˈhiːsɪv/n./adj.粘合剂/粘性的adhesive tape (胶带)
advisable/ədˈvaɪzəbl/adj.明智的It’s advisable to save for retirement (为退休储蓄是明智的)
alchemist/ˈælkəmɪst/n.炼金术士Alchemists attempted to transform lead into gold. (炼金术士试图把铅变成金)
auction/ˈɔːkʃn/n./v.拍卖The painting will be sold at auction (这幅画将在拍卖会上出售)
cellist/ˈtʃelɪst/n.大提琴家The orchestra includes a world-class cellist (乐队里有一个世界级的大提琴家。)
complacence/kəmˈpleɪsns/n.自满His complacence about his achievements is quite off-putting (他对自己成就的自满相当让人反感)
compress/kəmˈprɛs/v./n.压缩compress the file (压缩文件)
corps/kɔːr/n.兵团the United States Marine Corps （美国海军陆战队）
glossy/ˈglɒsi/adj.有光泽的a glossy magazine (一本有光泽的杂志)
granite/ˈgrænɪt/n.花岗岩a kitchen countertop made of granite (由花岗岩制成的厨房台面)
graphite/ˈgræfaɪt/n.石墨pencils made from graphite (由石墨制成的铅笔)
hazard/ˈhæzərd/n./v.危险/冒险hazard a guess (冒险猜测)
herald/ˈhɛrəld/n./v.预示herald the arrival of spring (预示春天的到来)
hockey/ˈhɒki/n.曲棍球play a game of hockey (玩一场曲棍球比赛)
incongruity/ˌɪnkɒnˈgruːɪti/n.不协调the incongruity between his actions and his words (他的行动和他的话之间的不一致)
intrepid/ɪnˈtrɛpɪd/adj.勇敢的an intrepid explorer (一位无畏的探险家)
intricate/ˈɪntrɪkɪt/adj.复杂的an intricate design (复杂的设计)
locality/ləʊˈkælɪti/n.地区，位置This plant is common in this locality (这种植物在此地区很常见)
luster/lustre/ˈlʌstər/n.光泽，光辉a diamond’s luster (钻石的光泽)
magnesium/mægˈniːziəm/n.镁Magnesium is a key component of many alloys (镁是许多合金的关键成分)
monotonous/məˈnɒtənəs/adj.单调的monotonous work (单调乏味的工作)
mythology/mɪˈθɒlədʒi/n.神话Greek mythology (希腊神话)
ooze/uːz/v.渗出Blood oozed out of the wound （血从伤口慢慢流出来）
outspoken/aʊtˈspoʊkən/adj.直言不讳的outspoken comments (直率的评论)
overdue/ˌəʊvərˈdjuː/adj.逾期的an overdue payment/library book (逾期的欠款；逾期未还的图书)
pastel/pæˈstel/n./adj.彩色蜡笔/柔和的，淡的a painting in pastel colors (用柔和色彩的画)
proclaim/prəˈkleɪm/v.宣告，公布proclaim the winner (宣布胜者)
refurbish/riːˈfɜːrbɪʃ/v.翻新，修复refurbish a building (翻新一栋楼)
religion/rɪˈlɪdʒən/n.宗教freedom of religion (宗教自由)
resonance/ˈrɛzənəns/n.共振，共鸣struck a chord of resonance (引起共鸣)
sewage/ˈsuːɪdʒ/n.污水sewage treatment plant (污水处理厂)
squid/skwɪd/n.鱿鱼squid game (鱿鱼游戏)
stratigraphy/ˌstrætɪˈɡræfi/n.地层学，岩层学study stratigraphy (学习地层学)
strip/strɪp/v./n.剥去/条，带strip the wallpaper off (剥去墙纸)
stunt/stʌnt/v./n.特技表演/噱头stunt man (特技演员)
suffragist/ˈsʌfrədʒɪst/n.妇女政权论者a famous suffragist (一位著名的妇女权利论者)
tedium/ˈtiːdiəm/n.乏味，单调to relieve the tedium (缓解乏味)
thwart/θwɔːrt/v./adj.阻碍，反对/横放的to thwart sb’s plans (阻挠某人的计划)
underlying/ˌʌndərˈlaɪɪŋ/adj.潜在的the underlying problem (潜在的问题)
vegetative/vɛdʒɪteɪtɪv/adj.植物的vegetative propagation (植物的繁殖)
wither/ˈwɪðər/v.凋谢，枯萎All our hopes just withered away (我们所有的希望都渐渐破灭了)

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 9 & 10
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 9 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
accredit/əˈkrɛdɪt/v.认证The university is accredited by the state / This degree programme is fully accredited by the Institution of Electrical Engineers.
adverse/ˈædvɜːrs/adj.不利的adverse weather conditions (恶劣的天气条件)
appreciation/əˌpriːʃiˈeɪʃn/n.欣赏，感激show appreciation for someone’s help
captivity/kæpˈtɪvɪti/n.囚禁，拘留The bird escaped from captivity
chilled/tʃɪld/adj.冷的a chilled drink (一杯冷饮)
commemorate/kəˈmɛməreɪt/v.纪念，庆祝commemorate the anniversary of a significant event (纪念重大事件的周年)
component/kəmˈpoʊnənt/n.组件，元素key components of a computer (电脑的主要组件)
cosmos/ˈkɒzmɒs/n.宇宙the origin of the cosmos (宇宙起源)
dehydrate/diːˈhaɪdreɪt/v.脱水Dehydrating fruit for preservation
despoil/dɪˈspɔɪl/v.掠夺despoil the environment (掠夺环境) / despoil the countryside (掠夺乡村)
diction/ˈdɪkʃən/n.措辞，用词Her diction is clear and concise (她的措辞清晰简洁)
dim/dɪm/adj./v.昏暗的dim lighting
elaborate/ɪˈlæbərət/adj./v.精细的/阐述elaborate on a topic (详细阐述一个主题)
engulf/ɪnˈgʌlf/v.吞没be engulfed in flames
eternal/ɪˈtɜːrnl/adj.永恒的eternal love
fairly/ˈfeərli/adv.公正地，相当地That’s a fairly common opinion
feudal/ˈfjuːdl/adj.封建的feudal society
heed/hiːd/v./n.注意，留心Heed the traffic signals (注意交通信号) / But what if the government takes no heed? （但要是政府不理会该怎么办呢？）
hibernation/ˌhaɪbərˈneɪʃn/n.冬眠，休眠Some animals enter hibernation during winter
hollow/ˈhɒləʊ/adj./n./v.空心的a hollow tree
horizon/həˈraɪzən/n.地平线The sun is rising from the horizon
illuminate/ɪˈlʊmɪneɪt/v.照亮，阐明illuminate the room with a lamp
incense/ˈɪnsɛns/n.香，熏香burn incense (烧香)
linguist/ˈlɪŋɡwɪst/n.通晓数国外语的人/语言学家She’s an excellent linguist
longevity/lɔːnˈdʒɛvɪti/n.长寿We wish you both health and longevity
medieval/mɛdiˈiːvəl/adj.中世纪的medieval architecture
meteorology/ˌmiːtiəˈrɑːlədʒi/n.气象学Meteorology: Science of the Atmosphere
mock/mɑːk/v.嘲笑/模仿He’s always mocking my French accent (他总是嘲笑我的法国口音) / mock trial (模拟审判)
nourishment/ˈnɝːrɪʃmənt/n.营养物obtain adequate nourishment
obscure/əbˈskjʊr/adj./v.模糊的/使模糊obscure the truth
pit/pɪt/n./v.坑，陷阱fall into a pit (掉进坑里)
plumage/ˈpluːmɪdʒ/n.鸟的羽毛The bright plumage of male birds (雄鸟的鲜艳羽毛)
porcelain/ˈpɔːrsəlɪn/n.瓷器porcelain vases
postpone/poʊˈspoʊn/v.延期，推迟postpone a meeting (推迟会议)
presidency/ˈprɛzɪdənsi/n.总统职位the current holder of the EU presidency
proponent/prəˈpoʊnənt/n.支持者proponent of change
seep/siːp/v.渗出water seeping into the basement (水渗入地下室)
strain/streɪn/v./n.拉紧/压力under strain (在压力下)
stride/straɪd/v./n.大步走/进步make strides in (在…方面取得进步)
surge/sɝːdʒ/v./n.汹涌，激增The gates opened and the crowd surged forward
terminus/ˈtɝːmɪnəs/n.终点站reach the terminus
territory/ˈtɛrɪtɔːri/n.领土，领地disputed territory
topsoil/ˈtɑːpˌsɔɪl/n.表层土壤topsoil contains few of the ingredients needed for long-term successful farming (表层土壤几只含有少量长期成功耕作所必需的成分)
transit/ˈtrænsɪt/n./v.运输/穿越goods damaged in transit (在运输中损坏的货物) / transit through a country (穿越一个国家)

Word List 10 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
abort/əˈbɔːrt/v.中止，终止abort the mission (中止任务)
acidic/əˈsɪdɪk/adj.酸性的acidic soil (酸性土壤)
adorn/əˈdɔːrn/v.装饰，修饰adorn with flowers (用花修饰)
atomic/əˈtɒmɪk/adj.原子的atomic energy (原子能)
bacteria/bækˈtɪəriə/n.细菌bacteria infection (细菌感染)
bulb/bʌlb/n.灯泡，球茎light bulb (灯泡)
cluster/ˈklʌstər/n.群，簇，串a cluster of grapes (一串葡萄)
debris/ˈdeɪbriː/n.碎片，残骸debris of the plane (飞机残骸)
destined/ˈdɛstɪnd/adj.注定的be destined to fail (注定失败)
elementary/ˌɛlɪˈmɛntəri/adj.基本的，初级的elementary school (小学)
engraving/ɪnˈɡreɪvɪŋ/n.雕刻，版画This type of engraving requires a delicate touch (这种雕刻要求手法轻巧)
entitle/ɪnˈtaɪtl/v.给予权利They are entitled to first class travel (他们有权享受头等舱旅行)
farce/fɑːrs/n.闹剧，笑剧turn into a farce (变成闹剧)
fulfill/fʊlˈfɪl/v.实现，完成fulfill a promise (履行承诺)
gospel/ˈɡɒspəl/n.福音书/真理gospel truth (真理)
hamper/ˈhæmpər/v.妨碍，阻挠hamper the progress (阻碍进展)
hygiene/ˈhaɪdʒiːn/n.卫生，卫生学personal hygiene (个人卫生)
ideology/ˌaɪdɪˈɒlədʒi/n.意识形态political ideology (政治理念)
infrared/ɪnfrəˈred/adj.红外线的infrared radiation (红外线辐射)
junction/ˈdʒʌŋkʃən/n.路口，交叉点at the junction (在交叉路口)
laureate/ˈlɔːriət/n.获奖人Nobel laureate (诺贝尔奖得主)
mammoth/ˈmæməθ/adj./n.巨大的/猛犸象mammoth task (艰巨的任务)
mania/ˈmeɪniə/n.狂热football mania (足球狂热)
muggy/ˈmʌɡi/adj.闷热潮湿的a muggy summer day (闷热潮湿的夏天)
outbreak/ˈaʊtbreɪk/n.爆发，暴动outbreak of war (战争爆发)
overload/ˌoʊvərˈloʊd/v./n.超载，过载an overloaded truck (一辆超载的卡车)
partial/ˈpɑːrʃl/adj.部分的/偏袒的be partial to someone (偏袒某人)
populate/ˈpɒpjuleɪt/v.居住于，生息populate the area (在该地区居住)
prevailing/prɪˈveɪlɪŋ/adj.盛行的prevailing wind (盛行风)
prohibitively/prəˈhɪbɪtɪvli/adv.(价格)高昂的prohibitively expensive (价格过于高昂)
proofread/ˈpruːfriːd/v.校对proofread a manuscript (校对手稿)
quota/ˈkwoʊtə/n.配额，限额immigration quota (移民配额)
rampant/ˈræmpənt/adj.泛滥的，猖獗的Inflation is rampant (通货膨胀肆虐)
recital/rɪˈsaɪtl/n.独奏会piano recital (钢琴独奏会)
reckless/ˈrɛkləs/adj.鲁莽的reckless driving (鲁莽驾驶)
restoration/ˌrɛstəˈreɪʃən/n.恢复，修复building restoration (建筑修复)
rodent/ˈroʊdnt/n.啮齿动物Mickey Mouse starts as an ugly, little rodent (米老鼠开始是又丑又小的噬齿动物)
scuba/ˈskuːbə/n.水肺潜水scuba diving (水肺潜水)
sewerage/ˈsuːərɪdʒ/n.下水道系统city sewerage system (城市下水道系统)
silt/sɪlt/n.淤泥，淤沙silt deposition (淤沙沉积)
stripe/straɪp/n.条纹，军衔a tiger’s stripes (老虎的条纹)
tension/ˈtɛnʃən/n.紧张，压力tension in the air (空气中的紧张感)
treadmill/ˈtrɛdmɪl/n.跑步机run on a treadmill (在跑步机上跑步)
tributary/ˈtrɪbjutɛri/n.支流a tributary of the Amazon (亚马逊的支流)
undertaking/ˌʌndərˈteɪkɪŋ/n.任务，工作a difficult undertaking (困难的任务)
unparalleled/ʌnˈpærəleɪld/adj.无比的，无双的unparalleled beauty (无比的美)
vigilance/ˈvɪdʒɪləns/n.警惕，警觉maintain vigilance (保持警惕)
wane/weɪn/v.衰退，减少Her popularity has been on the wane for some time (她的人气不断下降) / wane of the moon (月亏)

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 7 & 8
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 7 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
acidity
acting
alternate
angiosperm
aquifer
arboreal
aurora
blush
buckle
cardiac
centennial
chagrin
clog
comet
converge
curl
desolate
detest
ethonology
expressive
feminist
forerunner
impending
indicative
inventory
keen
landmass
latent
monumental
neutron
orchid
penmanship
plow
preponderance
primal
propel
quotation
ranch
rash
render
sacrificial
transcend
triangle
viral
单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
acidity/əˈsɪdɪti/n.酸度acidity of vinegar (醋的酸度)
acting/ˈæktɪŋ/adj./n.演戏，代理的acting manager (代理经理)， acting skills (表演技巧)
alternate/ɔːlˈtɝːneɪt/adj./v.交替，备选的alternate layers (交替的层次)， alternate solution (备选方案)
angiosperm/ˈændʒi.oʊ.spɝːm/n.被子植物angiosperm plant (被子植物)
aquifer/ˈækwɪfɚ/n.含水土层underground aquifer (地下含水层)
arboreal/ɑːrˈbɔːriəl/adj.树栖的，树的arboreal habitat (树栖生境)
aurora/ɔːˈrɔːrə/n.极光，曙光Aurora Borealis (北极光)， aurora australis (南极光)
blush/blʌʃ/n./v.脸红，羞愧blush with embarrassment (因尴尬而脸红)
buckle/ˈbʌkl/n./v.扣子，扣紧buckle your belt (扣紧你的皮带)
cardiac/ˈkɑːrdiæk/adj./n.心脏的，心脏病患者cardiac arrest (心脏停搏)， cardiac patient (心脏病患者)
centennial/sɛnˈtɛniəl/adj./n.百年纪念，一百年的centennial celebration (百年纪念活动)
chagrin/ʃəˈɡrɪn/n./v.失望，懊恼to her chagrin (使她失望的是)

Word List 8 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
administer/ədˈmɪnɪstər/v.管理，执行，给予administer medication (给予药物)
astute/əˈstuːt/adj.敏锐的，狡猾的an astute observer (敏锐的观察者)
bud/bʌd/n./v.芽，发芽bud of a plant (植物的芽)
canal/kəˈnæl/n.运河，人工水道the Suez Canal (苏伊士运河)
chill/tʃɪl/n./v./adj.寒冷，冷淡，冷静a chill in the air (空气中的寒冷)
cuneiform/kjuːˈniːɪfɔːrm/n./adj.楔形的，楔形文字cuneiform writing (楔形文字写作)
democrat/ˈdɛməkræt/n.民主主义者，民主党人a democrat politician (民主党政治家)
disseminate/dɪˈsɛmɪneɪt/v.散播，传播disseminate information (传播信息)
engaging/ɪnˈɡeɪdʒɪŋ/adj.吸引人的，迷人的an engaging story (吸引人的故事)
enrollment/ɪnˈroʊlmənt/n.登记，入学，入伍school enrollment (学校入学登记)
film/fɪlm/n./v.影片，薄膜，拍摄film a movie (拍摄一部电影)
fitness/ˈfɪtnəs/n.健康，适合physical fitness (身体健康)
flamboyant/flæmˈbɔɪənt/adj.艳丽的，浮夸的flamboyant style (浮夸的风格)
folklore/ˈfoʊklɔːr/n.民间传说，民间风俗study of folklore (民俗学研究)
generalization/ˌdʒɛnərəlɪˈzeɪʃən/n.概括，归纳make a generalization (做出一个概括)
incessantly/ɪnˈsɛsəntli/adv.不停地，连续不断地rain incessantly (连续不断地下雨)
larva/ˈlɑːrvə/n.幼虫larva of a butterfly (蝴蝶的幼虫)
lease/liːs/n./v.租赁，租约lease a car (租赁一辆车)
magnificent/mæɡˈnɪfɪsənt/adj.宏伟的，壮丽的a magnificent view (壮丽的景色)
meteorologist/ˌmiːtɪəˈrɒlədʒɪst/n.气象学家a meteorologist predicts weather (气象学家预测天气)
omit/oʊˈmɪt/v.省略，遗漏omit a word (省略一个词)
orientation/ˌɔːriːənˈteɪʃən/n.方向，定位，取向orientation session (定向会议)
pore/pɔːr/n.毛孔，细孔pores on the skin (皮肤上的毛孔)
portrait/ˈpɔːrtrɪt/n.肖像，画像portrait painting (肖像画)
prerequisites/priːˈrɛkwɪzɪts/n.先决条件，必备条件prerequisites for admission (入学的先决条件)
prolific/prəˈlɪfɪk/adj.多产的，丰富的a prolific writer (多产的作家)
punctual/ˈpʌŋktʃuəl/adj.准时的，守时的be punctual for meetings (会议准时)
rust/rʌst/n./v.锈，
saturated/ˈsætʃəreɪtɪd/adj.饱和的，充满的saturated solution (饱和溶液)
screen/skriːn/n./v.屏幕，筛选screen a movie (放映一部电影)
skyscraper/ˈskaɪˌskreɪpər/n.高楼大厦skyscraper city (摩天大楼的城市)
slumber/ˈslʌmbər/n./v.睡眠，沉睡slumber peacefully (平静地睡着)
strand/strænd/n./v.细线， strands of hair (头发丝); 搁浅， strand on an island (搁浅在岛上)
swan/swɑːn/n.天鹅swan lake (天鹅湖)
tuition/tuːˈɪʃən/n.学费tuition fees (学费)
underscore/ˌʌndərˈskɔːr/v.强调，下划线underscore the importance of (强调…的重要性)
viable/ˈvaɪəbl/adj.可行的，能生存的viable solution (可行的解决方案)
warehouse/ˈwɛərhaʊs/n.仓库warehouse storage (仓库存储)

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: TOEFL｜Word List 5 & 6
entry.content:
TOEFL Vocabulary (feat.ChatGPT)

Word List 5 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
ailment/ˈeɪlmənt/n.疾病An ailment is an illness, especially one that is not very serious / Many people suffer from some sort of chronic ailment
assimilate/əˈsɪmɪleɪt/v.吸收/融入This technique brings life to instruction and eases assimilation of knowledge / It took time for the immigrant to assimilate into the new culture
chubby/ˈʧʌbi/adj.圆胖的A chubby person is somewhat fat / The baby has chubby cheeks
courageous/kəˈreɪdʒəs/adj.勇敢的Firefighters are courageous people who risk their lives to save others / The children were very courageous
credential/krɪˈdɛnʃəl/n.资历/资格证书Someone’s credentials are their previous achievements, training, and general background, which indicate that they are qualified to do something
detergent/dɪˈtɜrdʒənt/n.清洁剂Please add some detergent to the washing machine
excavation/ˌɛkskəˈveɪʃən/n.挖掘The excavation of the ancient city took several years
evaluate/ɪˈvæljueɪt/v.评估We need to evaluate how well the policy is working
evacuate/ɪˈvækjueɪt/v.撤离Children were evacuated from London to escape the bombing
facilitate/fəˈsɪlɪteɪt/v.促进Computers facilitate the processing of large amounts of information
foremost/ˈfɔrmoʊst/adj.最重要的The foremost thing or person in a group is the most important or best / Health should be our foremost concern
frenzy/ˈfrɛnzi/n.狂热The crowd was whipped into a frenzy during the concert
friction/ˈfrɪkʃən/n.摩擦/冲突There was a lot of friction between the two colleagues
imprint/ˈɪmprɪnt/n.印记，痕迹If something leaves an imprint on a place or on your mind, it has a strong and lasting effect on it / As I arrived, the shimmering skyline of domes and minarets was imprinted on my memory
induce/ɪnˈduːs/v.引起/导致Doctors said surgery could induce a heart attack
inert/ɪˈnɜːrt/adj.惰性的/不活跃的The gas is inert and will not react with the other substances in the mixture / Inert gases like neon and argon have eight electrons in their outer shell
infection/ɪnˈfɛkʃən/n.感染It is important to clean wounds properly to avoid infection / The likelihood of infection is minimal
intuitive/ɪnˈtjuːɪtɪv/adj.直觉的If you have an intuitive idea or feeling about something, you feel that it is true although you have no evidence or proof of it / He had an intuitive sense of what the reader wanted
isolated/ˈaɪsəˌleɪtɪd/adj.偏僻的/孤立的An isolated place is a long way away from large towns and is difficult to reach / If you feel isolated, you feel lonely and without friends or help
jelly/ˈʤɛli/n.果冻She made a delicious dessert using strawberry jelly
jolt/ʤoʊlt/v.颠簸/震惊If something jolts or if something jolts it, it moves suddenly and quite violently / The sudden jolt of the train woke up all the passengers / The plane landed with a jolt
lament/ləˈmɛnt/v.哀悼If you lament something, you express your sadness, regret, or disappointment about it / Ken began to lament the death of his only son
lithosphere/ˈlɪθoʊˌsfɪr/n.岩石圈The lithosphere is the rigid outer layer of the Earth
opposed/əˈpoʊzd/adj.反对的I am utterly opposed to any form of terrorism
overtime/ˈoʊvərˌtaɪm/n.加班He had to work overtime to finish the project on time
photodissociation/ˌfoʊtoʊˌdɪsoʊsiˈeɪʃən/n.光解作用Photodissociation is the breaking of a chemical bond caused by the absorption of light
pigeon/ˈpɪʤən/n.鸽子The pigeon is a common bird in many cities around the world
poetry/ˈpoʊətri/n.诗歌Poetry is a form of literature that uses aesthetic and rhythmic qualities of language to evoke emotions
propose/prəˈpoʊz/v.提议He proposed a new plan to increase sales
reactor/riˈæktoʊr/n.反应堆A nuclear reactor is a device used to initiate and control a sustained nuclear chain reaction
recession/rɪˈsɛʃən/n.经济衰退During a recession, there is a significant decline in economic activity across the economy
reliable/rɪˈlaɪəbl/adj.可靠的People or things that are reliable can be trusted to work well or to behave in the way that you want them to
replenish/rɪˈplɛnɪʃ/v.补充If you replenish something, you make it full or complete again / to replenish food and water supplies
scurry/ˈskʌri/v.急赶When people or small animals scurry somewhere, they move there quickly and hurriedly, especially because they are frightened / The attack began, sending residents scurrying for cover
sensible/ˈsɛnsɪbl/adj.明智的It is sensible to save money for the future / The former option would be much more sensible
sluggish/ˈslʌɡɪʃ/adj.缓慢的The computer became sluggish after the update / Circulation is much more sluggish in the feet than in the hands
squash/skwɒʃ/v.压扁Be careful not to squash the fruit when you pack them.
subsequent/ˈsʌbsɪkwənt/adj.随后的The subsequent events were even more surprising / Subsequent events confirmed our doubts
substantiate/səbˈstænʃieɪt/v.证实He provided evidence to substantiate his claims
suburb/ˈsʌbɜːrb/n.郊区He lives in a suburb which is very peaceful
vague/veɪɡ/adj.模糊的The instructions were vague and difficult to follow
watercourse/ˈwɔːtərkɔːrs/n.水道The watercourse is essential for draining the rainwater away from the town

Word List 6 🚀

单词音标词性中文含义短语搭配
agreeable/əˈɡriːəbl/adj.令人愉快的If something is agreeable, it is pleasant and you enjoy it / The weather today is very agreeable for a picnic
allegiance/əˈliːdʒəns/n.忠诚They swore their allegiance to the U.S. and received their naturalization papers
angular/ˈæŋɡjələr/adj.有角的He had an angular face with prominent cheekbones
architect/ˈɑːrkɪtɛkt/n.建筑师The architect designed a modern building
cabin/ˈkæbɪn/n.小木屋We stayed in a cozy cabin in the woods
carp/kɑːrp/n.鲤鱼The pond is filled with carp
celestial/səˈlɛstʃəl/adj.天空的The celestial bodies include stars, planets, and moons
colonial/kəˈloʊniəl/adj.殖民地的，殖民的The country gained independence after years of colonial rule
comparable/ˈkɒmpərəbl/adj.可比的Farmers were supposed to get an income comparable to that of townspeople
complementary/ˌkɒmplɪˈmɛntəri/adj.互补的，补充的The two colors are complementary to each other.
cornerstone/ˈkɔːrnərstoʊn/n.奠基石The cornerstone of a successful business is a strong work ethic.
crow/kroʊ/n.乌鸦A crow cawed from a tree branch.
digression/dɪˈɡrɛʃən/n.离题The professor made several digressions during his lecture.
eccentric/ɪkˈsɛntrɪk/adj./n.古怪的，异常的 / 古怪的人He is an eccentric artist with a unique style.
eligible/ˈɛlɪdʒəbl/adj.合格的Only those over 18 years old are eligible to vote.
flagellum/fləˈdʒɛləm/n.鞭毛Some bacteria use a flagellum for movement.
fungi/ˈfʌndʒaɪ/n.真菌Mushrooms and yeasts are types of fungi.
improvise/ˈɪmprəvaɪz/v.即兴创作The musician forgot his sheet music and had to improvise.
inconspicuous/ˌɪnkənˈspɪkjuəs/adj.不显眼的，不引人注目的The spy wore inconspicuous clothing to avoid detection.
journal/ˈdʒɜːrnəl/n.日记，杂志She writes her thoughts and experiences in her journal every night.
lush/lʌʃ/adj.青翠的，丰富的The landscape was lush with greenery after the rain.
nominee/nɒˈmiːni/n.被提名人The nominee for best actor was thrilled to be recognized.
palate/ˈpælɪt/n.上颚，味觉The dish had a unique combination of flavors that pleased my palate.
quilt/kwɪlt/n.被子She made a beautiful quilt with a variety of colorful fabrics.
rancher/ˈræntʃər/n.牧场主The rancher took care of hundreds of cattle on his land.
reddish/ˈrɛdɪʃ/adj.带红色的The sunset cast a reddish hue on the landscape.
resign/rɪˈzaɪn/v.辞职The manager decided to resign after working for 10 years.
rupture/ˈrʌptʃər/n./v.断裂，破裂The rupture in the dam caused a massive flood.
sheath/ʃiːθ/n.鞘，外壳The knife is stored in a leather sheath.
shelter/ˈʃɛltər/n./v.避难所，庇护The travelers found shelter from the rain in a cave.
spherical/ˈsfɛrɪkəl/adj.球形的The Earth is not a perfect sphere but is slightly spherical.
tally/ˈtæli/n./v.计数，符合The final tally of votes showed a close race.
tenement/ˈtɛnəmənt/n.廉租公寓Many immigrants lived in tenement buildings in the 19th century.
tissue/ˈtɪʃuː/n.组织，纸巾She used a tissue to wipe her tears.
vacant/ˈveɪkənt/adj.空的，未占用的The house has been vacant for months.
verse/vɜːrs/n.诗，韵文She wrote a verse about the beauty of nature.
zealous/ˈzɛləs/adj.热情的He is zealous about volunteering and helping others

Reference 📚

  • 《TOEFL词汇（45天突破版）》
  • https://www.collinsdictionary.com/
  • https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt

entry.title: 高中信息技术｜章节概要5
entry.content:
Chpt5-数据处理与应用

目录 📚

5.1 - 人工智能的产生与发展

5.2 - 人工智能的应用

5.3 - 人工智能对社会的影响

学习目标 🎯

  1. 理解人工智能的概念，能结合实际辨别人工智能技术
  2. 了解人工智能产生及其发展历史，能初步辩证地看待人工智能的发展
  3. 了解人工智能在各个领域的应用，感受人工智能对促进社会发展的巨大作用
  4. 能科学地看待人工智能及其应用，认识到人工智能与人类和谐共处的必要性

内容总览 🚀

  • 人工智能的产生与发展

    • 人工智能的概念
    • 人工智能的发展历程

  • 人工智能的应用

    • 领域人工智能
    • 跨领域人工智能
    • 混合增强人工智能

  • 人工智能对社会的影响

    • 人工智能改善人类生活

    • 人工智能促进经济发展

    • 人工智能带来的社会担忧

entry.title: 高中信息技术｜章节概要4
entry.content:
Chpt4-数据处理与应用

目录 📚

4.1 - 常用表格数据的处理

4.2 - 大数据处理

4.3 - 大数据典型应用

学习目标 🎯

  1. 能根据实际需求，对表格数据进行处理
  2. 了解大数据处理的基本思想与框架
  3. 能使用 Python 进行简单数据处理，解决实际问题
  4. 能根据实际需求，选用合适的工具和方法对数据进行可视化
  5. 能从实际生活中发现数据应用的价值，认识到有效的数据处理对于提高数据价值的重要意义

内容总览 🚀

  • 常用表格数据的处理

    • 数据整理
    • 数据计算
    • 数据图表呈现

  • 大数据处理

    • 大数据处理的基本思想与架构
    • 编程处理数据
    • 文本数据处理
    • 数据可视化

  • 大数据典型应用

    • 智能交通
    • 电子商务
